DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare SYSTANE® HYDRATION Hyabak 0.15 % base total ocular surface stain score ( TOSS ) Day 42 .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Clinical Outcomes After Use SYSTANE® HYDRATION
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects first dispense preservative-free 0.9 % saline eye drop ( saline eye drop ) use Run-in phase Screening Visit Day 0 ( Visit 1 ) . Subjects qualify randomize 1:1 manner receive either treatment SYSTANE® HYDRATION Lubricant Eye Drops Hyabak 0.15 % Eye Drops .
DOC.criteria: Willing able attend study visit ; Use nonBAK ( Benzalkonium Chloride ) artificial tear least day , least 3 month prior Screening Visit ; Diagnosis Dry Eye ( health care professional ) least 3 month prior Screening Visit ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Women childbearing potential pregnant breast feeding ; Any hypersensitivity use study product formulation allergy ingredient ( ) contain within product formulation ; Ocular abnormalities either eye could adversely affect safety efficacy outcome ; Active ocular infection ( bacterial , viral , fungal ) active inflammation associate dry eye ; Use chronic systemic medication : ( prescription , counter , vitamins/supplements ) stable dose less 30 day prior Screening Visit , anticipate change dose regimen course study ; History ocular intraocular surgery serious ocular trauma either eye within past 6 month prior Screening Visit ; Any medical condition ( systemic ophthalmic ) may , opinion Investigator , preclude safe administration test article safe participation study ; Use topical ocular overthecounter prescribe medication either eye ( exception artificial tears/gels/ lubricant ) 2 week prior Screening Visit ; Contact lens use within 2 week prior Screening Visit unwilling avoid contact lens use course study ; Unwilling avoid use additional artificial tear ( study medication ) throughout study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
